public class EnemyTimer extends com.github.hanyaeger.api.Timer
A Timer for handling Enemy behaviour on the game screen

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemyTimer

      public EnemyTimer(Enemy enemy, Player player, long intervalInMs, GameScreen gameScreen)
      Initialises timer to handle behaviour of the Enemy
      Parameters:
      enemy - The Enemy of which the timer handles the behaviour of
      player - The Player to give enemy knowledge of his position
      intervalInMs - The interval in milliseconds to change behaviour of Enemy
      gameScreen - The screen where the Player and the Enemy are

  • Method Details

    • onAnimationUpdate

      public void onAnimationUpdate(long timestamp)
      Every interval the Fireball will move horizontally and the Zombie will angle himself to the Player and move to him. And if the Enemy is killed longer than 5 seconds ago the enemy will be respawned
      Specified by:
      onAnimationUpdate in class com.github.hanyaeger.api.Timer

    • respawn

      private void respawn(long timestamp)
      Respawns the enemy after 5 seconds are passed if he is dead
      Parameters:
      timestamp -

    • changeDirection

      private void changeDirection()
